text: Nebula is a fictional character, an alien villain and later anti-heroine appearing in the Marvel Comics universe. She was created by Roger Stern and the late John Buscema. == Fictional character biography == A pirate and mercenary operating in outer space, the character has frequently appeared as a major opponent of the Avengers, ally/rival of the Avengers, Nova, the Silver Surfer, and the Guardians of the Galaxy. She along with Jâ€™son are the secondary antagonists of the Guardians. == In other media == Nebula has appeared in several other media adaptations of the Marvel comics, including animated television series and video games. In the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) franchise, the character is played by actress Karen Gillan. Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: Nebula (character)
